FinancialAccountTransaction.name: FinancialAccountTransaction
FinancialAccountTransaction.description: Represents a single transaction related to a loan or a lease.

DebitCreditIndicator.description: Specifies whether the transaction is of type Credit or Debit.

FinancialAccountId.description: The financial account related to the transaction.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

PostedDate.description: The date when the transaction was posted to the financial account.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the financial account in an external system.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the transaction.

SubType.description: Specifies the subtype of the transaction.

TransactionDate.description: The date and time of the transaction.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the transaction.
